name: tglnpt
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(crn(c3)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cuni(crn(c3)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c3))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(crn(c3)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cstrkg), wss(cuni(crn(c3)), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ ran(c3)⊆ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (c2 ∈ TarskiG → ⋃ ran(c3)⊆ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c3))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cstrkg), wss(cuni(crn(c3)), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(c3))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (c2 ∈ TarskiG → ⋃ ran(c3)⊆ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, cstrkg), wss(cuni(crn(c3)), c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clng, c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c2 ∈ TarskiG → ⋃ ran(c3)⊆ c1)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(LineG ` c2)
⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c3))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clng, c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(c3))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(LineG ` c2)
⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c3))))
-| wi(w0, wss(c5, cuni(crn(c3))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clng, c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c5, cuni(crn(c3))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(LineG ` c2)
⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ ⋃ ran(c3))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c5, cuni(crn(c3))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crn(c3)))
-| wi(wcel(c5, crn(c3)), wss(c5, cuni(crn(c3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clng, c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crn(c3)))
-| wi(wcel(c5, crn(c3)), wss(c5, cuni(crn(c3))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(LineG ` c2)
⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ran(c3))
⊣ (c5 ∈ ran(c3)→ c5 ⊆ ⋃ ran(c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clng, c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crn(c3)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(LineG ` c2)
⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ran(c3))

comment: Lines are sets of points. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Oct-2019.)
